original_title: Muse: Live at BBC Radio 1's Big Weekend
overview: First gig of the Drones Festivals Tour 2015.  Muse headlined the festival on May 23rd, 2015, supported by 5 Seconds of Summer, Ben Howard, Charli XCX, David Guetta, Fall Out Boy, Florence + The Machine and The Vaccines.  This is the first time in nine years since Muse performed at the main stage of BBC Radio 1's Big Weekend. Their last performance was in 2006, and it was the first performance in the Black Holes and Revelations era.
title: Muse: Live at BBC Radio 1's Big Weekend
